SMC_CamDisplayer_Outputs (STRUCT)

Â¶
TYPE SMC_CamDisplayer_Outputs : STRUCT
Data structure containing all outputs of the
|SMC_Visu_CamDisplayer|
.
InOut:
Name
Type
Comment
cursor
SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics
Cam dynamics at the current cursor position.
segmentLeft
SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics
Cam dynamics at the left bound of the current segment.
segmentRight
SMC_CamDisplayer_Dynamics
Cam dynamics at the right bound of the current segment.

rows.Name: cursor
rows.Comment: Cam dynamics at the current cursor position.

rows.Name: segmentLeft
rows.Comment: Cam dynamics at the left bound of the current segment.

rows.Name: segmentRight
rows.Comment: Cam dynamics at the right bound of the current segment.
